name: Shmup Invaders
description:
A space invaders shmup mashup. The gameplay is very similar to space invaders, with some more modern graphics and game play.

This game is open source, and uses all art & sound from opengameart.org

Source can be viewed on GitHub: https://github.com/kainazzzo/S...

Some of the art used, from what I was able to recall:
